## UIUtils.makeQuatFromAxisAngle() method

根据指定旋转轴与旋转角度生成四元数

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static makeQuatFromAxisAngle( axis : Vector3f, angle : number) : Quaternion;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  axis | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | 旋转轴 |
|  angle | number | 旋转角度  { module:Common.Quaternion } |
